mapper.select: select se_customer.id, se_customer.customer_name, se_customer.customer_type, se_customer.telephone, se_customer.belong_company, se_customer.customer_icon, se_customer.enter_pool_date from se_communication left join se_customer on se_communication.customer_id = se_customer.id where se_communication.customer_id = #{customerId}

choose.when: select * from se_communication_log where customer_id = #{customerId} and communication_way = #{communicationWay}

mapper.insert: insert into se_communication_log (customer_id, communication_way, communication_content, communication_time) values(#{customerId}, #{communicationWay}, #{communicationContent}, #{communicationTime})

choose.when: update se_communication set visit_times = visit_times + 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}
update se_communication set call_times = call_times + 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}
update se_communication set msg_times = msg_times + 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}
update se_communication set wx_times = wx_times + 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}

mapper.update: update se_communication_log set customer_id = #{customerId}, communication_way = #{communicationWay}, communication_content = #{communicationContent}, communication_time = #{communicationTime} where id = #{id}

choose.when: update se_communication set visit_times = visit_times - 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}
update se_communication set call_times = call_times - 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}
update se_communication set msg_times = msg_times - 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}
update se_communication set wx_times = wx_times - 1 where customer_id = #{customerId}
